title: Successful User Registration
description: Verify that a new user can register with valid email and password and the authentication state is persisted.

steps.description: Navigate to the registration page
Enter a valid and unique email address
Enter a valid password meeting all password requirements
Submit the registration form
Check registration is successful and user is authenticated
Reload the application and verify the user remains authenticated

title: User Registration with Invalid Email
description: Ensure the registration fails when the user inputs an invalid email format.

steps.description: Navigate to the registration page
Enter an invalid email format (e.g., 'user@@domain')
Enter a valid password
Submit the registration form
Verify registration is rejected with an appropriate error message about invalid email

title: User Login Success
description: Verify that a registered user can login successfully with correct credentials and session persists.

steps.description: Navigate to the login page
Enter valid registered user email and password
Submit the login form
Confirm login is successful and user is taken to dashboard
Reload the application
Verify authentication state is persisted and user stays logged in

title: User Login Failure with Incorrect Password
description: Confirm the system rejects login attempts with a valid email but incorrect password.

steps.description: Navigate to the login page
Enter a valid user email with incorrect password
Submit the login form
Verify login is rejected and an error message is displayed

title: Dashboard Displays Active Rooms
description: Verify the dashboard displays a list of active rooms correctly after user login.

steps.description: Login as a valid user with existing rooms
Navigate to the dashboard page
Check that all active rooms owned or joined by the user are displayed
Verify each room displays correct information (name, category, status)

title: Create a New Matching Room
description: Verify that a user can create a new matching room by selecting a wedding category successfully.

steps.description: Login and navigate to the dashboard
Click on 'Create New Room'
Select a wedding category from the list
Submit room creation
Verify that a new room is created and user is taken to the room lobby
Confirm that the room code is generated and displayed

title: Join an Existing Room via 5-Character Code
description: Verify that a user can join an existing room by entering a valid unique 5-character code.

steps.description: Login and navigate to the dashboard
Click on 'Join Room'
Enter a valid 5-character room code
Submit the join request
Confirm user is successfully added to the room and navigated to the room lobby

title: Handle Joining Room with Invalid Code
description: Verify that an error is shown when the user tries to join a room with an invalid or non-existing 5-character code.

steps.description: Navigate to join room page
Enter an invalid or non-existent room code
Attempt to join the room
Verify that the system shows an appropriate error message and does not join the room

title: Room Lobby Displays Waiting Status
description: Verify that when a user creates a room and waits for their partner to join, the room lobby displays the waiting status appropriately.

steps.description: Create a new room and navigate to the room lobby
Check that the lobby shows a waiting message indicating the user is waiting for partner to join

title: Real-time Sync when Partner Joins Room Lobby
description: Verify that when the partner joins a room, the room lobby updates in real-time showing both participants present and allowing session start.

steps.description: User A creates a room and waits in lobby
User B joins the same room via code
Check User A’s lobby view updates instantly showing User B’s presence
Verify the option to start the session appears after both joined

title: Collaborative Swipe Decision Making in Room
description: Verify the interactive swipe interface works for both users in a room and decisions are reflected in real-time for both participants.

steps.description: Both users join a room and start a session
User A swipes right (like) on a wedding item
Verify that User B's view updates immediately reflecting User A's swipe action
User B swipes left (dislike) on the same item
Verify that User A's view updates immediately reflecting User B's swipe action
Confirm the item’s final match status reflects the combined user input correctly

title: Supplier Search Returns Results Under 200ms
description: Verify that searching for suppliers by keyword and filters returns results within 200 milliseconds.

steps.description: Navigate to the supplier search page
Enter a search term and apply filters (category, location, price range)
Submit the search
Measure and confirm search results are returned and displayed in under 200 milliseconds

title: Search Filters by Category, Location, and Price Work Correctly
description: Confirm that filters applied in the supplier search page properly refine the results accordingly.

steps.description: Navigate to the supplier search page
Select a supplier category filter
Select a location filter
Set a price range filter
Submit the search
Verify all displayed suppliers match the selected category
Verify all displayed suppliers are within the selected location
Verify all displayed suppliers have prices within the selected price range

title: Supplier Cards Display Images, Ratings, and Functional Shortlist Button
description: Verify that supplier cards on the search results render correctly with accurate images, ratings, and the shortlist button works as expected.

steps.description: Perform a supplier search that returns multiple results
Check each supplier card displays an image related to the supplier
Verify the rating stars are visible and correspond with supplier rating data
Click the shortlist button on a supplier card
Confirm the supplier is added to the shortlist and button state updates accordingly

title: Shortlisted Suppliers Integration into Matching Rooms
description: Verify that suppliers shortlisted from search can be integrated and accessed inside decision-making rooms for collaborative swiping.

steps.description: Shortlist one or more suppliers from the search page
Navigate to an existing matching room
Confirm shortlisted suppliers appear as options for swiping in the room
Perform swipe actions on shortlisted suppliers
Verify swipe decisions are reflected correctly and in realtime

title: Persistent Authentication State Across Sessions
description: Verify that authentication state persists even after closing and reopening the browser or tab.

steps.description: Login successfully with valid credentials
Verify user is logged in and dashboard is accessible
Close browser or tab
Reopen the application in a new tab or browser window
Verify the user remains authenticated and can access protected pages without re-login

title: Error Handling for Create Room with Missing Category
description: Verify that an attempt to create a room without selecting a wedding category is gracefully handled with an error message.

steps.description: Navigate to create room page from dashboard
Try to submit the form without selecting any category
Check that an error message is displayed requiring a category selection
Ensure room creation is blocked until a valid category is selected

title: UI Responsiveness of Supplier Cards
description: Verify supplier cards layout and components render correctly on various screen sizes including mobile, tablet, and desktop.

steps.description: Open supplier search on desktop resolution
Verify supplier cards are displayed properly in grid layout without overflow or clipping
Resize viewport to tablet dimensions
Confirm cards reflow appropriately and remain fully visible
Resize viewport to mobile dimensions
Check that cards stack vertically and UI elements remain accessible

title: Room Session Recovery After User Disconnect
description: Verify that if a user disconnects and later reconnects to a room session, their state and selections are restored accurately.

steps.description: Join an active matching room and begin swiping
Simulate network disconnect or close browser tab
Reconnect to the application and join the same room
Verify user’s previous swipes and session state are restored correctly
Confirm real-time synchronization resumes with the partner
